# kong-gateway_key_auth (Resource)

KeyAuth Resource

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "kong-gateway_key_auth" "my_keyauth" {
  consumer = {
    id = "...my_id..."
  }
  consumer_id = "f28acbfa-c866-4587-b688-0208ac24df21"
  created_at  = 1
  id          = "...my_id..."
  key         = "...my_key..."
  tags = [
    "..."
  ]
}
```

- `created_at` (Number) Unix epoch when the resource was created.
- `tags` (List of String)
